About

Welcome to King Code, your digital creative solution. King Code is an online marketing agency in Phuket providing online marketing services to businesses in Thailand, The USA, UK, Laos, Australia, South Africa, Zanzibar and all the countries in between. King Code is a team of skilled professionals offering an interconnected set of services to help our clients seize the opportunities of this digital age. We are your full-service digital marketing company specialising in website development, social media marketing, photography and videography.

Our services

Content Creation

We like to think of ourselves as painters with very expensive paintbrushes‚Äïa visual storyteller some might say. With an image, you have less than a second to capture someone's attention. With every photo, we are able to teleport the viewer into an atmosphere that we've captured.

Social Media Management

Grow your tribe. The modern day phenomena which is social media not only allows you to engage with existing customers at a personal level, but also has the ability to reach new clients. With our digital marketing skills, we will reach new clients for you!

Consultations

Since we are experts in the field of digital creation and social media management, we've been able to our clients from a to z time and time again. If you need guidance to help you get your business where you want it, contact us for a one-on-one consultation.
